descriptionHtml:
Craftable Steel LockPick lock pick

Description

It alway bugged me that in every single graftable mod on nexus you had only Lockpicks made from iron.
In all fairness I would say that the picks are from steel. Iron lockpick would break a lot easier. Also the
collour doesnt match with Iron. And also for some reason the only option is to craft 5 picks?
That is all changed now.

v1.1
Added more options 10,15,20, corrected names and Ids. Changed requirents, No perk is needed now
Credits:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=889]Leezi[/url]
For inspiration

[url=http://www.skyrimforge.com/forums/skyrimmodding/moddingtutorials/28901-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck/#before]Samutz[/url]
For Know How ;o)

And all those lovely people who created [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Tes5Mod:SkyEdit]SkyEdit[/url] for final touches.

[color=red]Also check out my other mods and the once I helped with:[/color]Much Love D13
Much Love D13
